flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=27>>27 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 27 bags = <<48-27=16>>16 bags for $22 each
16 bags were sold for 16 bags x $22/bag = $<<16*22=352>>352
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $352 = $<<306+250+352=908>>908
The salesman made $908 - $576 = $<<908-576=332>>332 in profit.
#### 332

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 16. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
